statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.headline: Lipscomb 83, Campbell 67
article.story: BUIES CREEK, N.C. -- Brian Wright scored 23 points and Adnan Hodzic notched a double-double to lead Lipscomb in an 83-67 win over Campbell on Monday night. Hodzic scored 20 points and grabbed 11 boards for the Bisons (9-13, 5-8 Atlantic Sun Conference), who avenged a one-point home loss to Campbell on Jan. 8. Michael Lusk added 13 points for the Bisons, and Wright was 4-for-6 from beyond the arc. Lorne Merthie and Jonathan Rodriguez scored 15 points apiece to lead the Fighting Camels (10-14, 7-8). Lipscomb shot 54.2 percent from the field (26 of 48) in the win compared to just 39.1 percent (25 of 64) for Campbell. The Bisons, who led 38-25 at the break, built their lead to 17 points with 4:34 left in the game. Both teams hit six 3-pointers apiece, but Lipscomb took 17 shots from long range while Campbell had 26 attempts.
